problem_text:
Let ℓ(X) denote the composition length of a finite group X. Let A be a finite nilpotent group acting by automorphisms on a finite soluble group G. Let c(G, A) be the number of trivial A-modules in a given A-composition series of G. (Note that c(G, A) = ℓ(C_G(A)) if (|A|, |G|) = 1.)
Conjecture: there are absolute constants C1 and C2 such that the Fitting height of G is at most C1ℓ(A) + C2c(G, A).
İ. Gülоğlu
